actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the working condition fringe benefit with respect to employee parking.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the exclusion from gross income for the working condition fringe benefit includes employer-provided parking on or near a location from which the employee commutes to work by mass transportation, by vanpool, or by carpool.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the working condition fringe benefit with respect to employee parking.
